main event: A boy observed a round silver object, the size of a dime at arm's length, moving North to South for five seconds on 22 April 1957.
interesting points: The object was visible for only five seconds., The sighting occurred at dusk., The observer was a 13-year-old boy from Amarillo., The report mentions the possible influence of a weather balloon released earlier in the day., The object's description includes being round and silver in color.
